Nice game a lot of hackers

This game has the best anti-cheat I have ever had the pleasure of witnessing in all my years of online gaming. If someone even had the AUDACITY to cheat, they would be removed immediately and banned forever, like they dropped a candy wrapper in Disney World. VAC is top-tier when it comes to stopping issues before they even happen.

The environment of CS:GO is incredibly friendly and care-free too. Whether it's your teammates complimenting you on how well you're doing, or silly players that look at the ground and spin around. It all just adds to the warm, watching the nature of the game.

The only thing I don't understand, and I'm quiet puzzled by is that developers felt the need to implement a report function, and also a profanity filter into the game. VAC bans cheaters as soon as soon as they load up CS:GO, so there's no reason for a report button. And the community is so overwhelmingly wholesome and kind that no one would ever dare to say a bad word. I ever saw someone say was "heck" after they died. 2 features aren't really needed.

But as long as VAC keeps doing great work, I'll keep playing! I would hate a game where cheaters run rampart, I can't even imagine it... I'm just grateful that VAC is here to protect me and my fellow CS:GO gamers.
